summary:
Camari: Um. *points to corner* is that normal?
Juliet: Yeah-
Will: Yes IT'S NORMAL IT'S A BIG BUNNY RELAX ABOUT IT
Juliet: Calm...
body:
Camari: Um. *points to corner* is that normal?
Juliet: Yeah-
Will: Yes IT'S NORMAL IT'S A BIG BUNNY RELAX ABOUT IT
Juliet: Calm down, Will.
Will: I got it FOR YOU!
Juliet: I'm aware of that
Will: You still haven't even told me you liked it!
Juliet: I know
Will: Oh so you don't like it?!
Camari: K, I'm just gonna go...

summary: You know all those posts about MCU Peter going to the spider-verse? Well what about Hobo Depressed Peter going to the MCU. Tony...
body: You know all those posts about MCU Peter going to the spider-verse? Well what about Hobo Depressed Peter going to the MCU. Tony and Stephen are shook but not surprised how their spider son has grown up so tired. Strange now has to put 2 giant children to bed.

blog.name: drstrangefangirl8900
blog.title: Ironstrange is real
blog.description:
Ask requests accepted for IRONSTRANGE headcanons and short fics. | I also do omegaverse IRONSTRANGE| Tony is a bottom , you can't change my mind.
Ironstrange only

summary: Sounds of a royal chariot getting ready for departure could be heard near the entrance of the Stark Royal Palace; departure of...
body:
Destined

Scene 1 leak ( :P ) (fic promotion)

Sounds of a royal chariot getting ready for departure could be heard near the entrance of the Stark Royal Palace; departure of yet another Alpha Suitor after they rejected the Prince. The Alpha Prince’s voice could be heard from the balcony of Prince Anthony’s bedchambers… Where Prince Anthony himself was standing near the window, with one hand over his chest & a single drop of tear rolling down his cheek… listening to the Alpha Prince tell his Father with so much of utter disgust, that Anthony was a disgrace of an omega prince & how he would never marry into a family like this.. Who couldn’t get their omega son in control.. Prince Anthony felt like scoffing at those words .. Those didn’t seem to matter to the Alpha Prince yesterday, but things just flipped since he found out today that the Stark kingdom was growing weak and couldn’t offer him enough dowry for the marriage….

“they’re all the same; those Alphas,….. All of them.. Him and those people before . All the same” Anthony thought … This was his 45th rejection at the age of 32… His Father will not let this go so easily .. He would be here shortly to punish Anthony, for being a worthless son, a worthless prince. And he would have to bear it. “Oh God! Please, I do not wish for Father to come here now” Anthony prayed silently as he sat down.

title: Love is an Overrated Battlefield
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BFkSWn

by squidlywiddly87

Request from Tumblr: “Can you do an angsty story with Steve using ‘love is overrated and I’m the one rating it’? Maybe the reader has some trust issues and is in love with Steve but later into the relationship starts to think she made a big deal out of loving him.”

blog.name: lovelyirony
blog.title: sharon's a good character y'all are just mean
blog.description: icon by starkxs. name is jess, please send in a full prompt! thanks so much for stopping by, I appreciate it!

summary: imagine carol and tony talking about kamala and peter bc they’re proud of their kids and are trying their best to be good...
question: imagine carol and tony talking about kamala and peter bc they’re proud of their kids and are trying their best to be good mentors/role models
answer:
Carol and Tony usually meet up for lunch at least biweekly, or meet up at the compound. Kamala and Peter sometimes tag along to have their own lunch/study session, and Carol and Tony always smile as Peter using some webbing to steal a fry and Kam stretches around his body to steal an apple slice. 

“They’re good kids,” Carol says. “Did you hear about what happened in New Jersey a couple of days ago, with the alien villain? Kam totally got her to calm down, and now we’re talking about having her move in with some of the other residents…” 

“That sounds great,” Tony says. “Did I tell you about Peter and the sentient spatula he built?” 

That goes on. 

Other times, Tony or Carol fly over, bone tired but they need…they need validation that they’re doing the best they can. 

“I wonder sometimes, if I go too far,” Carol wonders. “If I should really have let her be a hero. It’s so dangerous, and she has a life to live.” 

“She wouldn’t be doing this if she didn’t want to,” Tony says. “She knows her limits, I can attest to that. Carol, you’re doing your best. That’s all anyone can do. Well, you can also do a backflip which I’m pretty jealous of…” 

Sometimes, Carol catches Tony gazing into space as Peter’s working on something with Dr. Banner. 

“You’re doing a fine job, Tony,” she murmurs. “Don’t worry about it so much.” 

“Am I really the poster guy for mentorship?” 

“No, which is a good thing. Steve keeps reprimanding me for saying ‘fuck’ when children can overhear it.” 

“I highly doubt the parents really do mind if you’re saving their Suzie or Billy,” Tony says with a grin. “Although strangely, he keeps reminding me not to let the little superheroes try out the blasters…” 

“That’s because Riri knocked a window out,” Carol said. “For their buliding-wide hide-and-go-seek.”

reblog.comment:

Sometimes, Carol catches Tony gazing into space as Peter’s working on something with Dr. Banner. 

“You’re doing a fine job, Tony,” she murmurs. “Don’t worry about it so much.” 

“Am I really the poster guy for mentorship?” 

“No, which is a good thing. Steve keeps reprimanding me for saying ‘fuck’ when children can overhear it.” 

“I highly doubt the parents really do mind if you’re saving their Suzie or Billy,” Tony says with a grin. “Although strangely, he keeps reminding me not to let the little superheroes try out the blasters…” 

“That’s because Riri knocked a window out,” Carol said. “For their buliding-wide hide-and-go-seek.”

trail.content_raw:
Carol and Tony usually meet up for lunch at least biweekly, or meet up at the compound. Kamala and Peter sometimes tag along to have their own lunch/study session, and Carol and Tony always smile as Peter using some webbing to steal a fry and Kam stretches around his body to steal an apple slice. 

“They’re good kids,” Carol says. “Did you hear about what happened in New Jersey a couple of days ago, with the alien villain? Kam totally got her to calm down, and now we’re talking about having her move in with some of the other residents…” 

“That sounds great,” Tony says. “Did I tell you about Peter and the sentient spatula he built?” 

That goes on. 

Other times, Tony or Carol fly over, bone tired but they need…they need validation that they’re doing the best they can. 

“I wonder sometimes, if I go too far,” Carol wonders. “If I should really have let her be a hero. It’s so dangerous, and she has a life to live.” 

“She wouldn’t be doing this if she didn’t want to,” Tony says. “She knows her limits, I can attest to that. Carol, you’re doing your best. That’s all anyone can do. Well, you can also do a backflip which I’m pretty jealous of…” 

Sometimes, Carol catches Tony gazing into space as Peter’s working on something with Dr. Banner. 

“You’re doing a fine job, Tony,” she murmurs. “Don’t worry about it so much.” 

“Am I really the poster guy for mentorship?” 

“No, which is a good thing. Steve keeps reprimanding me for saying ‘fuck’ when children can overhear it.” 

“I highly doubt the parents really do mind if you’re saving their Suzie or Billy,” Tony says with a grin. “Although strangely, he keeps reminding me not to let the little superheroes try out the blasters…” 

“That’s because Riri knocked a window out,” Carol said. “For their buliding-wide hide-and-go-seek.”
trail.content:
Carol and Tony usually meet up for lunch at least biweekly, or meet up at the compound. Kamala and Peter sometimes tag along to have their own lunch/study session, and Carol and Tony always smile as Peter using some webbing to steal a fry and Kam stretches around his body to steal an apple slice. 

“They’re good kids,” Carol says. “Did you hear about what happened in New Jersey a couple of days ago, with the alien villain? Kam totally got her to calm down, and now we’re talking about having her move in with some of the other residents…” 

“That sounds great,” Tony says. “Did I tell you about Peter and the sentient spatula he built?” 

That goes on. 

Other times, Tony or Carol fly over, bone tired but they need…they need validation that they’re doing the best they can. 

“I wonder sometimes, if I go too far,” Carol wonders. “If I should really have let her be a hero. It’s so dangerous, and she has a life to live.” 

“She wouldn’t be doing this if she didn’t want to,” Tony says. “She knows her limits, I can attest to that. Carol, you’re doing your best. That’s all anyone can do. Well, you can also do a backflip which I’m pretty jealous of…” 

Sometimes, Carol catches Tony gazing into space as Peter’s working on something with Dr. Banner. 

“You’re doing a fine job, Tony,” she murmurs. “Don’t worry about it so much.” 

“Am I really the poster guy for mentorship?” 

“No, which is a good thing. Steve keeps reprimanding me for saying ‘fuck’ when children can overhear it.” 

“I highly doubt the parents really do mind if you’re saving their Suzie or Billy,” Tony says with a grin. “Although strangely, he keeps reminding me not to let the little superheroes try out the blasters…” 

“That’s because Riri knocked a window out,” Carol said. “For their buliding-wide hide-and-go-seek.”

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Ready to Comply
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2rJOjli

by WhinyWingedWinchester

Tony Stark closed his eyes with a sigh in the pitch black of an abandoned bunker in Siberia, and opened them again with a scream in a fully operational HYDRA lab, a familiar face smiling down at him, his entire body wracked with unending pain.

“Hey Tony. We’ve got some work to do, huh?”

summary:
“ Thanos messed uP. He said half but not THIS HALF”
“ shut up Steve at least you can still look at your gorgeous face! now who’s...
body:
“ Thanos messed uP. He said half but not THIS HALF”

“ shut up Steve at least you can still look at your gorgeous face! now who’s going to open this faceplate?!???”

*wiggles nubs aggressively*
